text: Henryk Bąk (2 January 1923 - 29 August 1987) was a Polish actor. He appeared in more than 50 films and television shows between 1952 and 1980. ==Selected filmography== * Eroica (1958) * Bad Luck (1960) * Milczące ślady (1961) * Kwiecień (1961) * Zacne grzechy (1963) * Barrier (1966) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1923 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Polish male film actors Category:People from Krasnystaw County
title: Henryk Bąk
